s221: Seventeen. (To rescue Zhao) reached Li, obtained Huang Shen and Wu Pu armies. Fought with Qin army, defeated them.
s228: Five. Captured Qin general Wang Li.
s229: Fourteen. Zhang Er was angry at Chen Yu, abandoned his general's seal and left.
s238: Six. Attacked and broke Zhang Han, Zhang Han's army retreated.
s241: Nineteen. Obtained Peng Yue's army at Changyi, attacked Chenliu. Using Li Yiji's strategy, army obtained stored grain.
s251: Twenty. Attacked Kaifeng, broke Qin general Yang Xiong, Xiong fled to Xingyang, Qin executed Xiong to display him.
s258: Eight. Chu urgently attacked Zhang Han, Zhang Han feared, sent Vice Chancellor Xin to return to Qin to request troops, Zhao Gao hindered him.
s261: Twenty-one. Attacked Yingyang, raided Han territory, cut off northern river crossings.
s268: Nine. Zhao Gao wanted to execute Xin, Xin feared, fled and went, told Zhang Han of the plot to rebel against Qin.
